revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Huawei |model=EGW1500E |revision= |asin= |fcc_date=11/25/2012 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |availability=now |type=wireless router,dsl modem |fcc_id=QIS-EGW1500E |ic_id=6369A-EGW1500E |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM6362;BCM6362KFEBG; |cpu1_cspeed=400 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model= |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM6362;BCM6362KFEBG; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM5338 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=8 |wan_ports=1 |flags=ADSL2+, enterprise class, |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|Enterprise Gateway}} :[http://enterprise.huawei.com/en/products/coll-communication/ipt/gateway/en_ip_egw1500e.htm Product page]
"EG11MAU VER. A RF" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :4x FXS, 1x FXO This device would appear to be using BCM6362 (BCM6362KFEBG). {{See also|Huawei HG253s v2|Huawei eSpace EGW1520}}
